data.title: Susan Blakely Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Susan Blakely on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Susan Blakely including Over the Top, The Perfect Neighbor, and more.
data.text:
If My Hole Could Talk

Charlie finds himself attracted to Angie (recurring guest star SUSAN BLAKELY - "Rich Man, Poor Man"), an older woman who writes self-help books. Meanwhile, Alan and Jake battle over a school assignment.

Waiting for the Right Snapper

Charlie tries to resist temptation when he meets the grown daughter of Angie (recurring guest star SUSAN BLAKELY), the woman he's dating, and realizes they have met before. Recurring guest star JANE LYNCH returns as Charlie's therapist, Dr. Freeman.

Exit Strategy

While on a stakeout with Metro P.D., Torres' partner mysteriously vanishes, with the subsequent investigation leading NCIS to uncover new evidence from a decade-old murder. Also, Ducky's friend, Cadence Darwin (Susan Blakely), presents him with a new opportunity during his guest lecture series.

The Error of Her Ways

The puzzling suicide of a woman (Kathy Cannon) who has been charged with her husband's murder prompts Jessica (Angela Lansbury) to question her guilt. Elliott Gould guest stars.

The Big Day

As the birth date of her triplets quickly approaches, a frazzled and emotional Rebecca forgets Jack's birthday. Dr. K struggles with the loss of his wife and wonders how he'll be able to continue on with his life without her. Joe - the firefighter who delivered baby Randall to the hospital - fights to save his marriage.
